CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 17, 1951, pg. 27, reads: "Masqueraders Meet 'Sonny' Brooks - The Profanity Club, a group formed to curb the use of vile epithets in public places, held 'Old Sunny Book' night at the Savoy Ballroom on Halloween night and presented 'Sonny' Brooks, center, salesman for the liquor company of that name, to the gala, costumed crowd. Walt Harper, shown in background, and his orchestra played for the affair. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Profanity Club members wearing halloween costumes, including "Sonny" Brooks in center, woman wearing genie costume and holding liquor bottle, and Walt Harper's band in background, including Jon Morris, Harold "Brushes" Lee, and Walt Harper, at Savoy Ballroom
